job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pThe world is producing and storing more data than ever before How would you like to join the Azure SQL team to keep that data safe and efficientppbrppIn the cloudbased world running our Azure service reliably and efficiently is key to Microsofts growth and future Azure SQL is one of the biggest services hosted by Azure Together we build on Azures phenomenal growth and success We are building trustworthy telemetry infrastructure and analytics to help us keep the service running smoothly prevent and reduce outages and increase customer satisfaction In constantly improving our scalability reliability and security we aim to monitor our large scale service in real time reduce noise in the system and have auto tuning solutions and selfremediation via bots We are building intelligent and smart diagnostics infrastructure to auto detect and fix problems that our customers face with their Azure resources It involves building large scale low latency distributed service building framework for adding diagnostics to make inferences and using intelligence to predict problems The goal is to build services that delights our customers solves their problems as quickly as possible and prevent them proactively We collaborate with data scientists on innovative solutions to improve customer experience with Azure SQL by leveraging this telemetry data and pipeline in new waysppbrppThis is a position with opportunity for high visibility projects across the Azure SQL and high impact in increasing service scalability We are a tightknit team who values diversity collaboration and learning from each other We are committed to be data driven agile and continuously improving customer experience We want to truly understand customer requirements and deliver solutions that not only satisfy their needs but exceed their expectations If that sounds like the right environment for you please join usppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppThis is a position with opportunity for high visibility projects across the Azure SQL and high impact in increasing service scalability We are a tightknit team who values diversity collaboration and learning from each other We are committed to be data driven agile and continuously improving customer experience We want to truly understand customer requirements and deliver solutions that not only satisfy their needs but exceed their expectations If that sounds like the right environment for you please join usppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppBasic QualificationspulliBachelors degree in Computer Science or Engineering or Mathematics or Statistics or Physics OR in place of these 2 years of industry software engineering experiencelili4 years of programming experience writing code in Java C C or C or other objectoriented programming languageliulpbrppstrongPreferred QualificationsstrongpulliGreat curiosity and willingness to questionliliHigh enthusiasm integrity ingenuity resultsorientation selfmotivation and resourcefulness in a fastpaced environmentliliExperience in database and data warehouse application design and developmentliliExperience developing and managing scalable cloud servicesliliExcellent communication and collaboration skills with proven technical leadership skillsliliData engineering experience in operationalizing data science model or building data engineering pipeline is a plus but not requiredliulpbrppMicrosoft is an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age ancestry color family or medical care leave gender identity or expression genetic information marital status medical condition national origin physical or mental disability political affiliation protected veteran status race religion sex including pregnancy sexual orientation or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws regulations and ordinances We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories consistent with legal requirements If you need assistance andor a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process please send a request via the Accommodation request formp
